Hello.

Welcome to the landing page.

About

Hi, I'm Steven. I'm a student at Rice majoring in computer science (how unique, I know). I love to design things, and I use code to supplement design with functionality. I made this site to showcase what I create, and because it's fun™.


Most of my hobbies revolve around creating things. In addition to programming, I also enjoy writing stories, drawing art, and making music. I've been trying to combine all of these in bigger projects, which I'm currently developing.


Work

Full Stack Development

CaseCtrl

In summer 2020, I worked with CaseCtrl, a medical startup streamlining the surgery scheduling process. I contributed to the the frontend, backend, and database of the CaseCtrl app, which is written as an ASP.NET core REST API (HTML/CSS, JS, C#, and SQL using Entity Framework).

View Project
Web and Mobile Development

Kopis Mobile

I'm working with the Kopis Safe team on two apps written in React, BASE and SCOUT. BASE is a content management system for venue security practices, while SCOUT helps venue operators assess their venue security using content defined in BASE.

View Project
Game Design

Intruder

Intruder is a platformer that I made with some friends. We wrote it in Unity, our first time using it. I also wrote the story, directed the art, and composed the music. Saying that this took a while would be the understatement of my life. Totally worth it though. 10/10 would suffer again.

View Project
Web Design

Personal Site

After eons of procrastination, I (finally) made a website. This site was coded and designed from scratch using the holy trinity. Most time was spent designing and making it responsive. This floating astronaut was something I came up with after I scrapped two older designs.
